content:
The Minister of Foreign Affairs of Lithuania, Gabrielius Landsbergis, reacted to the decision of the Russian Foreign Ministry to ban entry into the territory of the aggressor country.

About this hewroteOn Twitter, calling a ban on entry to Russia a "special reward".

"I would like to thank my team, my family and most importantly my country for this special award, thank you all," Gabrielius Landsbergis wrote.

I would like to thank my team, my family, and most of all my country for this very special award, thank you all.https://t.co/zzmfjM9PhK

- Gabrielius Landsbergis🇱🇹 (@glandsbergis)March 12, 2024
title: This is a special award: Lithuanian Foreign Minister thanked for the ban on entry into
description: He wrote about it on Twitter, calling a ban on entry into Russia a "special reward". ...
